subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund outran, outplayed and outscored Bayern Munich in a 3-1 soccer victory that puts the team 13 points clear at the top of the table and 16 points ahead of Bayern.
snippet: Borussia Dortmund outran, outplayed and outscored Bayern Munich in a 3-1 soccer victory that puts the team 13 points clear at the top of the table and 16 points ahead of Bayern.
